Posts.EditableText:
I have a student who needs to complete code he started in the PC version using the web based version.

Or if he restarts the project using the web version, can he download it to work on in the PC version?


My student has been gone a lot with school activities and is trying to catch up away from school.
Posts.HTML:
I have a student who needs to complete code he started in the PC version using the web based version.

Or if he restarts the project using the web version, can he download it to work on in the PC version?


My student has been gone a lot with school activities and is trying to catch up away from school.

Posts.EditableText: You cannot upload from the PC version to the web site, but you can easily download from the online editor to your PC.
Posts.HTML: You cannot upload from the PC version to the web site, but you can easily download from the online editor to your PC.

Posts.EditableText:
Thank you. He was needing to work on a Mac and was scrambling to find a way to work this weekend. 

Luckily a friend had a PC laptop he could borrow to be able to work on.
Posts.HTML:
Thank you. He was needing to work on a Mac and was scrambling to find a way to work this weekend.

Luckily a friend had a PC laptop he could borrow to be able to work on.
